attributes.longname: Percentage Cover of Sea Ice by Meltpond
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Percentage of sea ice, by area, which is covered by melt ponds, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice .
attributes.comment: Percentage of sea ice, by area, which is covered by melt ponds, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice .

attributes.longname: Ocean Drag Coefficient
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Oceanic drag coefficient that is used to calculate the oceanic momentum drag on sea ice
attributes.comment: Oceanic drag coefficient that is used to calculate the oceanic momentum drag on sea ice

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Snow-to-Ice Conversion
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: The rate of change of sea ice mass due to transformation of snow to sea ice divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: The rate of change of sea ice mass due to transformation of snow to sea ice divided by grid-cell area

attributes.longname: Downwelling Shortwave Flux over Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconca)
attributes.description: The downwelling shortwave flux over sea ice (always positive by sign convention)
attributes.comment: The downwelling shortwave flux over sea ice (always positive by sign convention)

attributes.longname: Snow Thickness in Ice Thickness Categories
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siitdconc)
attributes.description: Actual thickness of snow in each  category (NOT volume divided by grid area),  (vector with one entry for each thickness category starting from the thinnest category, netcdf file should use thickness bounds of categories as third coordinate axis)
attributes.comment: K=ice depth bands

attributes.longname: Sea-Surface Tilt Term in Force Balance (X-Component)
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: X-component of force on sea ice caused by sea-surface tilt
attributes.comment: X-component of force on sea ice caused by sea-surface tilt

attributes.longname: Maximum Shear Stress in Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc) time: point
attributes.time_title: Instantaneous value (i.e. synoptic or time-step value)
attributes.description: Maximum shear stress in sea ice (second stress invariant)
attributes.comment: Maximum shear stress in sea ice (second stress invariant)

attributes.longname: Atmospheric Drag Coefficient
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Atmospheric drag coefficient that is used to calculate the atmospheric momentum drag on sea ice
attributes.comment: Atmospheric drag coefficient that is used to calculate the atmospheric momentum drag on sea ice

attributes.longname: Downwelling Shortwave Flux Under Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: The downwelling shortwave flux underneath sea ice (always positive)
attributes.comment: The downwelling shortwave flux underneath sea ice (always positive)

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Growth in Supercooled Open Water (Frazil)
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: The rate of change of sea ice mass due to sea ice formation in supercooled water (often through frazil formation) divided by grid-cell area. Together, sidmassgrowthwat and sidmassgrowthbot should give total ice growth
attributes.comment: The rate of change of sea ice mass due to sea ice formation in supercooled water (often through frazil formation) divided by grid-cell area. Together, sidmassgrowthwat and sidmassgrowthbot should give total ice growth

attributes.longname: X-Component of Ocean Stress on Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: X-component of ocean stress on sea ice
attributes.comment: X-component of ocean stress on sea ice

attributes.longname: Thickness of Refrozen Ice on Melt Pond
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice_melt_pond (comment: mask=simpconc)
attributes.description: Volume of refrozen ice on melt ponds divided by meltpond covered area
attributes.comment: Volume of refrozen ice on melt ponds divided by meltpond covered area

attributes.longname: Snow Area Percentage
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Percentage of sea ice, by area, which is covered by snow, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice . Exclude snow that lies on land or land ice.
attributes.comment: Percentage of sea ice, by area, which is covered by snow, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice . Exclude snow that lies on land or land ice.

attributes.longname: Y-Component of Ocean Stress on Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Y-component of ocean stress on sea ice
attributes.comment: Y-component of ocean stress on sea ice

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Area Percentage (Ocean Grid)
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Percentage of grid cell covered by sea ice
attributes.comment: Percentage of grid cell covered by sea ice

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Extent South
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean
attributes.description: Total area of all Southern-Hemisphere grid cells that are covered by at least 15 % areal fraction of sea ice
attributes.comment: Total area of all Southern-Hemisphere grid cells that are covered by at least 15 % areal fraction of sea ice

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Area Percentage Tendency Due to Dynamics
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Total change in sea-ice area fraction through dynamics-related processes (advection, divergence...)
attributes.comment: Total change in sea-ice area fraction through dynamics-related processes (advection, divergence...)

attributes.longname: Temperature at Ice-Ocean Interface
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Report temperature at interface, NOT temperature within lowermost model layer
attributes.comment: Report temperature at interface, NOT temperature within lowermost model layer

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Area North
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean
attributes.description: total area of sea ice in the Northern hemisphere
attributes.comment: total area of sea ice in the Northern hemisphere

attributes.longname: Sea Mass Area Flux Through Straits
attributes.cell_methods: time: mean
attributes.description: net (sum of transport in all directions) sea ice area transport through the following four passages, positive into the Arctic Ocean 1. Fram Strait = (11.5W,81.3N to (10.5E,79.6N) 2. Canadian Archipelago = (128.2W,70.6N) to (59.3W,82.1N) 3. Barents opening = (16.8E,76.5N) to (19.2E,70.2N) 4. Bering Strait = (171W,66.2N) to (166W,65N)
attributes.comment: Flux across 4 straits

attributes.longname: Snow Mass Rate of Change Through Wind Drift of Snow
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: the rate of change of snow mass through wind drift of snow (from sea-ice into the sea) divided by sea-ice area
attributes.comment: the rate of change of snow mass through wind drift of snow (from sea-ice into the sea) divided by sea-ice area

attributes.longname: Net Conductive Heat Fluxes in Ice at the Bottom
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: the net heat conduction flux at the ice base
attributes.comment: the net heat conduction flux at the ice base

attributes.longname: Freshwater Flux from Sea-Ice Surface
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Total flux of fresh water from sea-ice surface into underlying ocean. This combines both surface melt water that drains directly into the ocean and the drainage of surface melt pond. By definition, this flux is always positive.
attributes.comment: Total flux of fresh water from sea-ice surface into underlying ocean. This combines both surface melt water that drains directly into the ocean and the drainage of surface melt pond. By definition, this flux is always positive.

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Area Percentage (Atmospheric Grid)
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean
attributes.description: Percentage of grid cell covered by sea ice
attributes.comment: Percentage of grid cell covered by sea ice

attributes.longname: Y-Component of Sea-Ice Mass Transport
attributes.cell_methods: time: mean
attributes.description: Includes transport of both sea ice and snow by advection
attributes.comment: Includes transport of both sea ice and snow by advection

attributes.longname: Sea Ice Thickness
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Actual (floe) thickness of sea ice (NOT volume divided by grid area as was done in CMIP5)
attributes.comment: (in OImon, sit was volume per entire cell area)

attributes.longname: X-Component of Sea-Ice Mass Transport
attributes.cell_methods: time: mean
attributes.description: Includes transport of both sea ice and snow by advection
attributes.comment: Includes transport of both sea ice and snow by advection

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Area Percentages in Thickness Categories
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Percentage of grid cell covered by each ice-thickness category (vector with one entry for each thickness category starting from the thinnest category, netcdf file should use thickness bounds of the categories as third coordinate axis)
attributes.comment: K=ice depth bands

attributes.longname: Lateral Sea Ice Melt Rate
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: The rate of change of sea ice mass through lateral melting divided by grid-cell area (report 0 if not explicitly calculated thermodynamically)
attributes.comment: The rate of change of sea ice mass through lateral melting divided by grid-cell area (report 0 if not explicitly calculated thermodynamically)

attributes.longname: Snow Heat Content per Unit Area
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Heat-content of all snow in grid cell divided by total grid-cell area. Snow-water equivalent at 0 Celsius is assumed to have a heat content of 0 J.  Does not include heat content of sea ice.
attributes.comment: Heat-content of all snow in grid cell divided by total grid-cell area. Snow-water equivalent at 0 Celsius is assumed to have a heat content of 0 J.  Does not include heat content of sea ice.

attributes.longname: Meltpond Mass per Unit Area (as Depth)
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice_melt_pond (comment: mask=simpconc)
attributes.description: Meltpond Depth
attributes.comment: Meltpond Depth

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Volume North
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean
attributes.description: total volume of sea ice in the Northern hemisphere
attributes.comment: total volume of sea ice in the Northern hemisphere

attributes.longname: Ridged Ice Thickness
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice_ridges (comment: mask=sirdgconc)
attributes.description: Sea Ice Ridge Height (representing mean height over the ridged area)
attributes.comment: Sea Ice Ridge Height (representing mean height over the ridged area)

attributes.longname: Coriolis Force Term in Force Balance (X-Component)
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: X-component of force on sea ice caused by coriolis force
attributes.comment: X-component of force on sea ice caused by coriolis force

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Evaporation and Sublimation
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: The rate of change of sea-ice mass change through evaporation and sublimation divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: The rate of change of sea-ice mass change through evaporation and sublimation divided by grid-cell area

attributes.longname: Temperature at Snow-Ice Interface
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Report surface temperature of ice where snow thickness is zero
attributes.comment: Report surface temperature of ice where snow thickness is zero

attributes.longname: Net Upward Sensible Heat Flux Under Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: the net sensible heat flux under sea ice from the ocean
attributes.comment: the net sensible heat flux under sea ice from the ocean

attributes.longname: Average Normal Stress in Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc) time: point
attributes.time_title: Instantaneous value (i.e. synoptic or time-step value)
attributes.description: Average normal stress in sea ice (first stress invariant)
attributes.comment: Average normal stress in sea ice (first stress invariant)

attributes.longname: Maximum Shear of Sea-Ice Velocity Field
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc) time: point
attributes.time_title: Instantaneous value (i.e. synoptic or time-step value)
attributes.description: Maximum shear of sea-ice velocity field (second shear strain invariant)
attributes.comment: Maximum shear of sea-ice velocity field (second shear strain invariant)

attributes.longname: Downwelling Longwave Flux over Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconca)
attributes.description: the downwelling longwave flux over sea ice (always positive)
attributes.comment: the downwelling longwave flux over sea ice (always positive)

attributes.longname: Net Latent Heat Flux over Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconca)
attributes.description: the net latent heat flux over sea ice
attributes.comment: the net latent heat flux over sea ice

attributes.longname: Net Conductive Heat Flux in Ice at the Surface
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: the net heat conduction flux at the ice surface
attributes.comment: the net heat conduction flux at the ice surface

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Bottom Melting
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: The rate of change of sea ice mass through melting at the ice bottom divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: The rate of change of sea ice mass through melting at the ice bottom divided by grid-cell area

attributes.longname: Upwelling Longwave Flux over Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconca)
attributes.description: the upwelling longwave flux over sea ice (always negative)
attributes.comment: the upwelling longwave flux over sea ice (always negative)

attributes.longname: Y-Component of Sea-Ice Velocity
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: The y-velocity of ice on native model grid
attributes.comment: The y-velocity of ice on native model grid

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Surface Melting
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: The rate of change of sea ice mass through melting at the ice surface divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: The rate of change of sea ice mass through melting at the ice surface divided by grid-cell area

attributes.longname: Net Upward Sensible Heat Flux over Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconca)
attributes.description: the net sensible heat flux over sea ice
attributes.comment: the net sensible heat flux over sea ice

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Heat Content per Unit Area
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Heat content of all ice in grid cell divided by total grid-cell area. Water at 0 Celsius is assumed to have a heat content of 0 J.  Does not include heat content of snow, but does include heat content of brine. Heat content is always negative, since both the sensible and the latent heat content of ice are less than that of water
attributes.comment: Heat content of all ice in grid cell divided by total grid-cell area. Water at 0 Celsius is assumed to have a heat content of 0 J.  Does not include heat content of snow, but does include heat content of brine. Heat content is always negative, since both the sensible and the latent heat content of ice are less than that of water

attributes.longname: Sea-Surface Tilt Term in Force Balance (Y-Component)
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Y-component of force on sea ice caused by sea-surface tilt
attributes.comment: Y-component of force on sea ice caused by sea-surface tilt

attributes.longname: Surface Temperature of Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Report surface temperature of snow where snow covers the sea ice.
attributes.comment: Report surface temperature of snow where snow covers the sea ice.

attributes.longname: Snow Mass Rate of Change Through Melt
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: the rate of change of snow mass through melt divided by sea-ice area
attributes.comment: the rate of change of snow mass through melt divided by sea-ice area

attributes.longname: Snow Mass per Area
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Total mass of snow on sea ice divided by sea-ice area.
attributes.comment: (in OImon, sim included snow and sea ice mass)

attributes.longname: Internal Stress Term in Force Balance (X-Component)
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: X-component of force on sea ice caused by internal stress (divergence of sigma)
attributes.comment: X-component of force on sea ice caused by internal stress (divergence of sigma)

attributes.longname: Snow Area Percentages in Ice Thickness Categories
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siitdconc)
attributes.description: Percentage of grid cell covered by snow in each ice-thickness category (vector with one entry for each thickness category starting from the thinnest category, netcdf file should use thickness bounds of the categories as third coordinate axis)
attributes.comment: K=ice depth bands

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass Change from Thermodynamics
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Total change in sea-ice mass from thermodynamic processes divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: Total change in sea-ice mass from thermodynamic processes divided by grid-cell area

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass Change from Dynamics
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Total change in sea-ice mass through dynamics-related processes (advection,...) divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: Total change in sea-ice mass through dynamics-related processes (advection,...) divided by grid-cell area

attributes.longname: X-Component of Sea-Ice Velocity
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: The x-velocity of ice on native model grid
attributes.comment: The x-velocity of ice on native model grid

attributes.longname: Snow Mass Rate of Change Through Snow-to-Ice Conversion
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: the rate of change of snow mass due to transformation of snow to sea ice divided by sea-ice area
attributes.comment: the rate of change of snow mass due to transformation of snow to sea ice divided by sea-ice area

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass per Area
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Total mass of sea ice divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: (in OImon, sim included snow and sea ice mass)

attributes.longname: Downward Sea Ice Basal Salt Flux
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: This field is physical, and it arises since sea ice has a nonzero salt content, so it exchanges salt with the liquid ocean upon melting and freezing.
attributes.comment: This field is physical, and it arises since sea ice has a nonzero salt content, so it exchanges salt with the liquid ocean upon melting and freezing.

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Area Percentage Tendency Due to Thermodynamics
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Total change in sea-ice area fraction through thermodynamic processes
attributes.comment: Total change in sea-ice area fraction through thermodynamic processes

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Volume South
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean
attributes.description: total volume of sea ice in the Southern hemisphere
attributes.comment: total volume of sea ice in the Southern hemisphere

attributes.longname: Freshwater Flux from Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Total flux of fresh water from water into sea ice divided by grid-cell area; This flux is negative during ice growth (liquid water mass decreases, hence upward flux of freshwater), positive during ice melt (liquid water mass increases, hence downward flux of freshwater)
attributes.comment: Total flux of fresh water from water into sea ice divided by grid-cell area; This flux is negative during ice growth (liquid water mass decreases, hence upward flux of freshwater), positive during ice melt (liquid water mass increases, hence downward flux of freshwater)

attributes.longname: Y-Component of Atmospheric Stress on Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Y-component of atmospheric stress on sea ice
attributes.comment: Y-component of atmospheric stress on sea ice

attributes.longname: Snow Mass Rate of Change Through Advection by Sea-Ice Dynamics
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: The rate of change of snow mass through advection with sea ice divided by sea-ice area
attributes.comment: The rate of change of snow mass through advection with sea ice divided by sea-ice area

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Area South
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean
attributes.description: total area of sea ice in the Southern hemisphere
attributes.comment: total area of sea ice in the Southern hemisphere

attributes.longname: Divergence of the Sea-Ice Velocity Field
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc) time: point
attributes.time_title: Instantaneous value (i.e. synoptic or time-step value)
attributes.description: Divergence of sea-ice velocity field (first shear strain invariant)
attributes.comment: Divergence of sea-ice velocity field (first shear strain invariant)

attributes.longname: Snow Mass Rate of Change Through Evaporation or Sublimation
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: the rate of change of snow mass through sublimation and evaporation divided by sea-ice area
attributes.comment: the rate of change of snow mass through sublimation and evaporation divided by sea-ice area

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Freeboard
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Mean height of sea-ice surface (=snow-ice interface when snow covered) above sea level
attributes.comment: Mean height of sea-ice surface (=snow-ice interface when snow covered) above sea level

attributes.longname: Snow Mass Change Through Snow Fall
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: mass of solid precipitation falling onto sea ice divided by sea-ice area
attributes.comment: mass of solid precipitation falling onto sea ice divided by sea-ice area

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Volume per Area
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Total volume of sea ice divided by grid-cell area (this used to be called ice thickness in CMIP5)
attributes.comment: Total volume of sea ice divided by grid-cell area (this used to be called ice thickness in CMIP5)

attributes.longname: Age of Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Age of sea ice
attributes.comment: Age of sea ice

attributes.longname: Sea Ice Salinity
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Mean sea-ice salinity of all sea ice in grid cell
attributes.comment: Mean sea-ice salinity of all sea ice in grid cell

attributes.longname: Snow Mass Flux Through Straits
attributes.cell_methods: time: mean
attributes.description: net (sum of transport in all directions) sea ice area transport through the following four passages, positive into the Arctic Ocean 1. Fram Strait = (11.5W,81.3N to (10.5E,79.6N) 2. Canadian Archipelago = (128.2W,70.6N) to (59.3W,82.1N) 3. Barents opening = (16.8E,76.5N) to (19.2E,70.2N) 4. Bering Strait = (171W,66.2N) to (166W,65N)
attributes.comment: Flux across 4 straits

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Speed
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Speed of ice (i.e. mean absolute velocity) to account for back-and-forth movement of the ice
attributes.comment: Speed of ice (i.e. mean absolute velocity) to account for back-and-forth movement of the ice

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Mass Change Through Basal Growth
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: The rate of change of sea ice mass due to vertical growth of existing sea ice at its base divided by grid-cell area.
attributes.comment: The rate of change of sea ice mass due to vertical growth of existing sea ice at its base divided by grid-cell area.

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Area Flux Through Straits
attributes.cell_methods: time: mean
attributes.description: net (sum of transport in all directions) sea ice area transport through the following four passages, positive into the Arctic Ocean 1. Fram Strait = (11.5W,81.3N to (10.5E,79.6N) 2. Canadian Archipelago = (128.2W,70.6N) to (59.3W,82.1N) 3. Barents opening = (16.8E,76.5N) to (19.2E,70.2N) 4. Bering Strait = (171W,66.2N) to (166W,65N)
attributes.comment: Flux across 4 straits

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Extent North
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean
attributes.description: Total area of all Northern-Hemisphere grid cells that are covered by at least 15 % areal fraction of sea ice
attributes.comment: Total area of all Northern-Hemisphere grid cells that are covered by at least 15 % areal fraction of sea ice

attributes.longname: Sea-Ice Thickness in Thickness Categories
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siitdconc)
attributes.description: Actual (floe) thickness of sea ice in each  category (NOT volume divided by grid area),  (vector with one entry for each thickness category starting from the thinnest category, netcdf file should use thickness bounds of categories as third coordinate axis)
attributes.comment: K=ice depth bands

attributes.longname: Snow Thickness
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where snow over sea_ice area: time: mean where sea_ice
attributes.description: Actual thickness of snow (snow volume divided by snow-covered area)
attributes.comment: (in OImon, snd was volume per entire cell area)

attributes.longname: Compressive Sea Ice Strength
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Computed strength of the ice pack, defined as the energy (J m-2) dissipated per unit area removed from the ice pack under compression, and assumed proportional to the change in potential energy caused by ridging. For Hibler-type models, this is P (= P*h exp(-C(1-A)) where P* is compressive strength, h ice thickness, A compactness and C strength reduction constant).
attributes.comment: Computed strength of the ice pack, defined as the energy (J m-2) dissipated per unit area removed from the ice pack under compression, and assumed proportional to the change in potential energy caused by ridging. For Hibler-type models, this is P (= P*h exp(-C(1-A)) where P* is compressive strength, h ice thickness, A compactness and C strength reduction constant).

attributes.longname: Internal Stress Term in Force Balance (Y-Component)
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Y-component of force on sea ice caused by internal stress (divergence of sigma)
attributes.comment: Y-component of force on sea ice caused by internal stress (divergence of sigma)

attributes.longname: Rainfall Rate over Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: mass of liquid precipitation falling onto sea ice divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: mass of liquid precipitation falling onto sea ice divided by grid-cell area

attributes.longname: Mass of Salt in Sea Ice per Area
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
attributes.description: Total mass of all salt in sea ice divided by grid-cell area
attributes.comment: Total mass of all salt in sea ice divided by grid-cell area

attributes.longname: X-Component of Atmospheric Stress on Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: X-component of atmospheric stress on sea ice
attributes.comment: X-component of atmospheric stress on sea ice

attributes.longname: Percentage Cover of Sea Ice by Ridging
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconc)
attributes.description: Fraction of sea ice, by area, which is covered by sea ice ridges, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice .
attributes.comment: Fraction of sea ice, by area, which is covered by sea ice ridges, giving equal weight to every square metre of sea ice .

attributes.longname: Upwelling Shortwave Flux over Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: time: mean where sea_ice (comment: mask=siconca)
attributes.description: The upwelling shortwave flux over sea ice (always negative)
attributes.comment: The upwelling shortwave flux over sea ice (always negative)

attributes.longname: Fraction of Time Steps with Sea Ice
attributes.cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
